text: So I have what I imagine to be a very common content pattern, and I was wondering what the most idiomatic way of implementing it within HubSpot would be
there's a video player on top, and beneath it, it displays thumbnails/names in a list
I have the documentation for "How to create a repeater", but that seems to terminate its iteration eventually
ideally, the user can keep adding new listings until they're done
there's only two parameters per listing: title, and video ID
